name: Pazing By
description:
This Demo version have 3+2 boss to challenge.
If you still want to challenge after completed those 3 boss/(or you can't),
press "=" button to activate CHEAT mode, and holding number pad 1~7 to teleport other stages!

Keyboard Control (Default Setting)

Up/Down/Left/Right Arrow: Up/Down/Left/Right Movement
Z: Jump/Confirm
X: Use pet/Cancel
C: Floating(After beating the game)
ESC: Pause game
Key Numpad 8246: Partner Mode’s Pet Movement
